Properties.ProtectedString:
local Tool = script.Parent local Grenade = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local myTorso local myHumanoid local vPlayer
local throwAnim
Tool.Enabled = true
local boomSound
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local spikePart = Instance.new("Part") spikePart.FormFactor = 3 spikePart.Size = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5) spikePart.Shape = "Block" spikePart.Name = "Spike" spikePart.CanCollide = true
local spikeMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") spikeMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59092052" --spikeMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=59091614" spikeMesh.Parent = spikePart
function computeMass(obj) local children local mass if type(obj) == "userdata" then children = obj:GetChildren() else children = obj end
for i = 1, #children do if children[i]:IsA("BasePart") then mass = mass + children[i]:GetMass() end mass = computeMass(children[i]) + mass end return mass end
function tagHumanoid(humanoid, player) if humanoid then local creatorTag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") creatorTag.Name = "creator" creatorTag.Value = player creatorTag.Parent = humanoid debris:AddItem(creatorTag, 1.25) end end
function blow(hit) if hit and hit.Parent and hit.Parent ~= vCharacter then local humanoid = hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid and myHumanoid and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then humanoid:TakeDamage(20) tagHumanoid(humanoid, vPlayer) end end end
function spike(hit, grenadeClone) if hit and hit.Parent and grenadeClone then
boomSound = Grenade:FindFirstChild("Boom") if boomSound then boomSound:Play() end
local e = Instance.new("Explosion") local initPos = grenadeClone.Position e.Position = grenadeClone.Position e.BlastPressure = 0 e.BlastRadius = 10 e.Parent = game.Workspace debris:AddItem(e, 1) if grenadeClone then grenadeClone:Destroy() end
local players = game.Players:GetPlayers() for i = 1, #players do if players[i] and players[i] ~= vPlayer and players[i].Character ~= nil and players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") and players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then local distance = (myTorso.Position - players[i].Character.Torso.Position).magnitude if distance < 30 then local floatScript = Tool.FloatScript:Clone() floatScript.Parent = players[i].Character floatScript.Disabled = false end end end end end
function shoot(direction, grenadeClone) if myTorso and myHumanoid then local spawnPos = Grenade.Position + direction * 4.0 grenadeClone.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction)
grenadeClone.Velocity = (direction + Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)).unit * 55.0 grenadeClone.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local floatForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") floatForce.force = Vector3.new(0, grenadeClone:GetMass() * 88.1, 0) floatForce.Parent = grenadeClone
grenadeClone.Parent = game.Workspace
grenadeClone.Touched:connect(function(hit) spike(hit, grenadeClone) end)
debris:AddItem(grenadeClone, 2.5) end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if myTorso == nil or myHumanoid == nil then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
local grenadeClone = Grenade:Clone() grenadeClone.CanCollide = true
Grenade.Transparency = 1.0
local target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint local direction = (target - Grenade.Position).unit
shoot(direction, grenadeClone)
wait(4.75) Grenade.Transparency = 0.0 Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) end
function onUnequipped() if throwAnim then throwAnim:Stop() end if boomSound then boomSound:Stop() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)
Grenade.Touched:connect(spike)

Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local character = script.Parent while character:FindFirstChild("Torso") == nil or character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil do wait() end
local debris = game:GetService("Debris") local torso = character.Torso local humanoid = character.Humanoid
function computeMass(obj) local children local mass = 0 if type(obj) == "userdata" then children = obj:GetChildren() else children = obj end
for i = 1, #children do if children[i]:IsA("BasePart") then mass = mass + children[i]:GetMass() end mass = computeMass(children[i]) + mass end return mass end
local characterMass = computeMass(character)
if torso:FindFirstChild("GravBF") == nil then
local bodyForce = Instance.new("BodyForce") bodyForce.force = Vector3.new(0, characterMass * 200.1, 0) bodyForce.Name = "GravBF" bodyForce.Parent = torso
debris:AddItem(bodyForce, 7.0) end
if humanoid then humanoid.WalkSpeed = 6.0 wait(7.0) humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
wait(0.5) script:Remove()
